data: Kam Arnold Kam Arnold Ph.D., UC Berkeley, 2010 Office: SERF 404 Phone: 510-717-2321 ksarnold@ucsd.edu Kam's research focuses on measurement of the intensity and polarization of the Cosmic Microwave Background (CMB). His future plans include developing technology for the next generation of detectors/telescopes. Description of research: cosmology.ucsd.edu
